Detailed Description

Functions for managing System Power Optimization (SPOT).

#include <stdbool.h>
#include <string.h>
#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"

Functions

uint32_t am_hal_spotmgr_power_state_update (am_hal_spotmgr_stimulus_e eStimulus, bool bOn, void *pArgs)
 Power states update This API should be called before turning things on and after turning things off, or before switching to high performance mode and after switching to low power mode, or when temperature range is changed.
 
uint32_t am_hal_spotmgr_default_reset (void)
 Restore power state to POR default.

uint32_t am_hal_spotmgr_init (void)
 SPOT manager init This API should be called from am_hal_pwrctrl_low_power_init, to initialise SPOT manager.
